name: Heather Shannon
offering: Podcast Creation, Podcast Host, Podcast Services, Podcasts Course
what_you_do: I'm a Certified Sex Therapist and host of the "Ask A Sex Therapist" podcast.
who_you_serve: I work with singles and relationship partners to help them answer the questions "Who am I as a sexual being?" and "How do I want to show up in my intimate relationship(s)?"
social_proof: I'm one of fewer than 1,000 AASECT Certified Sex Therapists (CSTs) in the country. And I'm one of only a handful of CSTs who uses IFS (Internal Family Systems) to help people do their sexual healing and growth work.
signature_programs: 3-Month Intimacy Infusion Coaching Program for Individuals, 3-Month Intimacy Infusion Coaching Package for Relationship Partners
business_focus: I'm all about authenticity when it comes to sex and letting go of the "shoulds."
